de.wirecard.epos

Interface ScannerManager


  • public ScannerManager

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      de.wirecard.rxparallel.SingleParallel<de.wirecard.epos.extension.scanner.ScannerDevice,de.wirecard.epos.util.events.Event> discoverDevices() 
      de.wirecard.rxparallel.SingleParallel<de.wirecard.epos.extension.scanner.ScannerDevice,de.wirecard.epos.util.events.Event> discoverDevices()
      This method is used for scanning of all available devices which are connected to device and selecting one of them. Events: Event.Update, AvailableScannerTypesEvent, AvailableScannersEvent
      de.wirecard.rxparallel.SingleParallel<de.wirecard.epos.extension.scanner.ScannerDevice,de.wirecard.epos.util.events.Event> discoverDevices()
      This method is used for scanning of all available devices which are connected to device and selecting one of them. Events: Event.Update, AvailableScannerTypesEvent, AvailableScannersEvent
      io.reactivex.Single<de.wirecard.epos.extension.scanner.ScannerDevice> getSelectedDevice()
      Method returns actual selected scanner. Scanner can be set by call ScannerManager.discoverDevices method with reaction to event .
      io.reactivex.Single<de.wirecard.epos.extension.scanner.EposScannerExtension> getSelectedExtension()
      Method returns actual selected extension. Extension can be set by call ScannerManager.discoverDevices method with reaction to event .
      io.reactivex.Single<java.lang.Boolean> isInitialized()
      Method returns boolean state, if printer manager is initialized. Basically it means, that ScannerManager.getSelectedExtension and ScannerManager.getSelectedDevice return some value and ScannerManager.discoverDevices was properly called.
      io.reactivex.Completable resetSelectedDevice()
      Method will reset selected device and extension.
      io.reactivex.Observable<de.wirecard.epos.util.events.Event> scan() 
      io.reactivex.Observable<de.wirecard.epos.util.events.Event> scan()
      Perform scan action on selected device Events: Event.Update, ScannerEvent.Scanned
      io.reactivex.Observable<de.wirecard.epos.util.events.Event> scan()
      Perform scan action on selected device Events: Event.Update, ScannerEvent.Scanned

    • Method Detail

      • getSelectedExtension

        io.reactivex.Single<de.wirecard.epos.extension.scanner.EposScannerExtension> getSelectedExtension()

        Method returns actual selected extension. Extension can be set by call ScannerManager.discoverDevices method with reaction to event .

        See Also:
        ScannerManager.discoverDevices

      • getSelectedDevice

        io.reactivex.Single<de.wirecard.epos.extension.scanner.ScannerDevice> getSelectedDevice()

        Method returns actual selected scanner. Scanner can be set by call ScannerManager.discoverDevices method with reaction to event .

        See Also:
        ScannerManager.discoverDevices

      • resetSelectedDevice

        io.reactivex.Completable resetSelectedDevice()

        Method will reset selected device and extension.

      • isInitialized

        io.reactivex.Single<java.lang.Boolean> isInitialized()

        Method returns boolean state, if printer manager is initialized. Basically it means, that ScannerManager.getSelectedExtension and ScannerManager.getSelectedDevice return some value and ScannerManager.discoverDevices was properly called.

        See Also:
        ScannerManager.getSelectedExtension, ScannerManager.getSelectedDevice, ScannerManager.discoverDevices

      • discoverDevices

        de.wirecard.rxparallel.SingleParallel<de.wirecard.epos.extension.scanner.ScannerDevice,de.wirecard.epos.util.events.Event> discoverDevices()
        See Also:
        ScannerManager.discoverDevices

      • discoverDevices

        de.wirecard.rxparallel.SingleParallel<de.wirecard.epos.extension.scanner.ScannerDevice,de.wirecard.epos.util.events.Event> discoverDevices()

        This method is used for scanning of all available devices which are connected to device and selecting one of them. Events: Event.Update, AvailableScannerTypesEvent, AvailableScannersEvent

      • scan

        io.reactivex.Observable<de.wirecard.epos.util.events.Event> scan()
